objectives.title: NotificationBell CSS Fix
objectives.notes: Pointer-events issue fixed, button clickable. Full flow requires SignalR.

objectives.title: Reports Page Charts
objectives.notes: Charts implemented with Chart.js, test passing completely

remediation.resolution: File created with 557 lines of comprehensive documentation

knownLimitations.title: SignalR Not Mocked
knownLimitations.detail: Notification real-time features require SignalR which is not mocked in test environment

knownLimitations.title: TypeScript Test Types
knownLimitations.detail: 89 TypeScript errors in test files due to Jest/Cypress type definitions
knownLimitations.documented: Pre-existing issue, does not affect runtime

gitCommit.message: fix(ui): Complete STORY-FE-7.2 - Align UI with Specifications

justification: All story objectives met. TC-FE-7.7 and TC-FE-7.8 passing. Mocking documentation complete. Known limitations properly documented.
